comments:
Description:
EmptyStackException when drag measure to detail the second time.

Build number:2.2.0.v20070328

Steps to reproduce:
1. new a cube.
2. Insert a crosstab.
3. Drag a measure to detail area.
4. Drag the measure to detail area again.

Expected result:
The measure is inserted.

Actual result:
Internal error.
